Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.mapclasses

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.mapclasses.GameMap
  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the map of the game.

      • getCoord

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCoord​(Square square)
        Return the coordinates of the Square passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        square - The Square of which the method will find the coordinates.
        Returns:
        A two-Integer Array, the first value is the x coordinate, the second value is the y coordinate.

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare​(java.lang.Integer x,
                        java.lang.Integer y)
        Returns the Square in the coordinates (x, y).

        It can return a null pointer if there is no Square in that coordinates. The caller of the method must control that the coordinates are not negative and that they are lower than the max coordinate possible

        Parameters:
        x - The first coordinate of the Square.
        y - The second coordinate of the Square.
        Returns:
        The Square in the coordinates (x, y).

      • getRoom

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getRoom​(Square square)
        Returns all the Square that are in the same room of the Square passed by parameter.

        The method returns also the Square passed by parameter.

        Parameters:
        square - The Square of which the method will find the room.
        Returns:
        The List of the Squares that compose the room of the Square passed by parameter.

      • getVisibility

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getVisibility​(Square square)
        Return all the Squares that are visible from the Square passed by parameter.

        The method returns also the Square passed by parameter

        Parameters:
        square - The Square of which the method will find the visibility.
        Returns:
        The List of the Square that are visible from the Square passed by parameter.

      • getRange

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getRange​(Square square,
                                            java.lang.Integer range)
        Returns all the Squares that can be reached with the number of moves passed by the parameter or less.

        Attention! The Squares can be not visible from the starting square.

        Parameters:
        range - The maximum number of moves that can be done.
        square - The starting Square to calculate the range.
        Returns:
        The list of Squares that can be reached with the number of moves passed by the parameter or less. This list contains no repetitions.

      • getDistance

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getDistance​(Square square,
                                               java.lang.Integer distance)
        Returns all the Squares that can be reached only and exactly with the number of moves passed by the parameter.

        Attention! The Squares can be not visible from the starting square.

        Parameters:
        distance - The exact number of moves that can be done.
        square - The starting Square to calculate the distance.
        Returns:
        The list of Squares that can be reached only and exactly with the number of moves passed by the parameter.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method compares two GameMap objects and returns true if they are to be considered equals.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - a GameMap object to be compared with the GameMap object that called this method.
        Returns:
        true if the two objects have the same Square[][] grid.
